title: Help with Random Freezes
body:
Hi All,

I dont know where to post this, hopefully im posting it right, im having a bit of an issue.

I have a RX 270 Graphics card from AMD, and sometimes i get Frame lag, and sometimes the game freezes for a tiny bit, usually in big team fights, and i end up either dying or costing the team. My graphics are all set on High, and I have Vsync off, problem is when i turn VSYNC on i drop in FPS hard.

I was wondering if there is anything that can be done?

I Have already updated my card to its latest update and I still dont know exactly why league frame lags. I have an I7 processor with 8 gigs of ram.

Any more info you need ill be happy to give out.

Please any ideas would help


And again i apologize if this is the wrong place to post this!

replies.body:
The driver you have installed may be corrupted or simply malfunctioning, or there could be some issues with your power settings preventing the card from operating to its full capacity. I strongly recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it commonly resolves issues like this.

If those steps yielded any change, please let me know.
